page.title: 17LEISURE PURSUIT HORSE RIDING
page.content: The local area affords many opportunities for the child interested in ponies.There is a riding school at Shavers End which caters for beginners where most of the local children ride. There is a livery and training establishment at Eastgrove for the more experienced rider who wants to specialize in a particular field such as dressage, eventing or hunting. In addition to these The Wyre Forest Branch of the Pony Club holds many of its activities in the area.The branch has 84 members from 3 - 20 years who take part in working rallies, hunter trials,gymkhanas,dressage and horse trials. The One-Day Event has been held for many years at The Knapp,the home of the District Commissioner. This year a new cross country course is being constructed at Eastgrove by a band of willing parents.
